mapper.insert: insert into Product (productID, amount, total, userID) values (#{productID}, #{amount}, #{total}, #{userID})
mapper.select: SELECT productID, amount, total FROM Product, User, Role Where Product.userID = User.userID AND Role.roleID = User.roleID AND Role.roleID = 1
SELECT productID, amount, total, userID FROM Product WHERE productID = #{productID}
SELECT productID, amount, total, userID FROM Product WHERE userID = #{userID}
